text:
@realDonaldTrump Democratic liberal COVID-19 survival kit:
1.A gallon of bleach- for bath and drinking.

2. Bubble wrap- for body protection.

3. Fragile stickers- to put on bubble wrap.

4. A protection mask- with chloroform for nighty night.
#Readthelabelliberals
